title: RA Sushi offers tempura options including shrimp and vegetables
statement: RA Sushi serves tempura that is lightly battered and includes options for colossal shrimp, shrimp, calamari, and vegetables.

citations.quote: TEMPURA Lightly battered and served with tempura sauce. Your choice of: Colossal shrimp Shrimp Calamari Vegetable
